user_query: How many customers do we have?
sql_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as customer_count FROM customers

user_query: List all products with price greater than 100

sql_query: SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) as total_sales FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT * FROM users WHERE created_at >= '2024-01-01' AND created_at < '2025-01-01'
SELECT p.name, SUM(oi.quantity * oi.price) as total_sales FROM products p JOIN order_items oi ON p.id = oi.product_id GROUP BY p.id, p.name ORDER BY total_sales DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT AVG(total_amount) as avg_order_value FROM orders
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 50
